scenario_text.value:
Saki... Where are you?
Are you okay?

Please, Aoi! Cheer up!
We’ll find them!
You’re right. We’ll definitely find them!
I’ll help too, so let’s all keep looking!

Thank you, Labramon.
I feel better.
You two get along really well.
That’s right! Aoi and I are reeeal close!
Me and Takuma are real close, too!
It was like that when we met, too.

It was. I didn’t think it was strange or
scary.
Right? I’m not scary at all!
That’s true! Heheh.

(Agumon scared me at first, but Aoi seemed
perfectly fine.)
(I wonder why?)
A special bond.
Maybe she fed her?
You two have a special bond, I bet.

I hope so. That would make me so happy if it
was true.
I think Aoi is pretty special!

Thank you, Labramon.
I feel the same.
Takuma is special too!

Ah, thanks...
Now you’re embarrassing me.

Did you feed her something when you first
met?
What? That’s not why I like Aoi so much!
But Labramon is like a dog sometimes.
What?!
What’s a dog, Takuma?
It’s an animal like Labramon.
Hey!

Heheh. I also kinda think Labramon is
a little like a doggy.
Not you too, Aoi!
Why not? Dogs are so cute!

If you say so...
But I still don’t get it.
Oh, by the way, Takuma, I found this...

Labramon says it’ll come in handy...
I’m not sure, but can you take it?
What? Are you sure?
Yes. I think you’ll make good use of it.
Thanks. I’ll be careful with it.
I want to look around here some more.
